content: वासना {@--1@} Knowledge derived from memory; <ab>cf.</ab> भावना. {@--2@} Particularly, the impression unconsciously left on the mind by past good or bad actions, which therefore produces pleasure or pain. {@--3@} Fancy, imagination, idea. {@--4@} False idea, ignorance. {@--5@} A wish, desire, expectation, inclination; ससारवासनाबद्धशृखला <ls>Gīt. 3.</ls> {@--6@} Regard, liking, respectful regard; तेषां (पक्षिणां) मध्ये मम तु महती वासमा चातकेषु <ls>Bv. 4. 17.</ls> {@--7@} Perfuming, scenting.
